}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "PMX28X12G2-M" and a date code of '''0650''' (Dec. 2006) is silkscreened on the board. :PNY Attaché 1GB • [[Phison]] PS2134CH-G - found device: [154b:0005]
